data.name: AboutBoxTextBlock
data.value: This software is intended to detect and analyse object movements in videos. It is based on the famous Viana version of Thomas Kerstinga t the Universität Essen. We would like to have some feedback ->

data.name: ButtonAboutToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to get information about the application.

data.name: ButtonDatagridWindowToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to show the datagrid window

data.name: ButtonApplicationToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to control the application.

data.name: ButtonAutomaticDataAquisitionLabelDescription
data.value: Detect the position of the target automatically.

data.name: ButtonAutomaticDataAquisitionToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to detect the position of the target object in each video frame automatically via the color key.

data.name: ButtonCalibrateVideoToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to specify origin and dimensions of the video content.

data.name: ButtonChangeColorSchemeLabelDescription
data.value: Change the color scheme of the headers and backgrounds of the application.

data.name: ButtonChangeColorSchemeToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to change the color scheme of the headers and backgrounds of the application.

data.name: ButtonChangeLanguageLabelDescription
data.value: Change the language of the application.

data.name: ButtonChangeLanguageToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to change the language of the application.

data.name: ButtonClipVideoLabelDescription
data.value: Select the area in which the target may appear.

data.name: ButtonClipVideoToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to select the area of the video in which the target can appear to speed up processing and improve precision.

data.name: ButtonLoadVideoToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to load a new video file for analysis.

data.name: ButtonManualDataAquisitionLabelDescription
data.value: Specify the position of the target manually.

data.name: ButtonManualDataAquisitionToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to manually specify the position of the target object in each video frame.

data.name: ButtonNewToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to create a new video analysis project.

data.name: ButtonPropertiesWindowToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to show the properties window

data.name: ButtonResetColorSchemeLabelDescription
data.value: Reset the color scheme to defaults.

data.name: ButtonResetColorSchemeToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to reset the color scheme to defaults.

data.name: ButtonRestoreLayoutLabelDescription
data.value: Load window layout of user interface and window arrangement from file.

data.name: ButtonRestoreLayoutLabelTitle
data.value: Restore window layout of user interface and window arrangement from file.

data.name: ButtonRestoreLayoutToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to load the stored window layout of the user interface and window arrangement from a xml file.

data.name: ButtonSaveLayoutLabelDescription
data.value: Save layout of user interface and window arrangement to a file.

data.name: ButtonSaveLayoutToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here save the layout of the user interface and window arrangement to a file.

data.name: ButtonSelectColorToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to select the target objects color in the current video frame.

data.name: ButtonVideoWindowToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to show the video window

data.name: DirectShowErrorPreface
data.value: This error occured during processing your request:

data.name: ManualDataAcquisitionDescription
data.value: 1. Please click with the left mouse button on the center of the tracked object, the video will automatically advance one frame. 2. When you want to go one frame back use the right mouse button. 3. Once finished, press Enter.

data.name: QATButtonSaveLabelDescription
data.value: Save video analysis data to disk ...

data.name: QATButtonSaveToolTipDescription
data.value: Saves the measured movement data time series into an ASCII file on disk.

data.name: CalibrateWindowSpecifyLengthDescription
data.value: Please click with the left mouse button at the starting position of an object with known length and click again at the ending point of the object with known length.

data.name: CalibrateWindowSpecifyOriginDescription
data.value: Please click with the left mouse button at the position in the video frame where the origin of the data points (0,0) should be located.

data.name: ButtonChartWindowToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to create charts fot the measured data points.

data.name: DatagridDisplayUnitsLabelDescription
data.value: Add units to data values in datagrid

data.name: DatagridDisplayUnitsToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to display the units for the data values in the datagrid table.

data.name: ShowCalibrationToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to show or hide the calibration ruler of the measured video. (Only availble, if video has been calibrated)

data.name: ShowClipRegionToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to display the object search region in the video, if specified.

data.name: CalibrationErrorMessage
data.value: line in dialog along with the measurements unit.

data.name: LengthDialogDescription
data.value: Please enter the length of the marked element.

data.name: ClipVideoDescriptionMessage
data.value: Please click and drag the four lines at the margion of the image to specify the bounds of the search region of the target. Click OK or press Enter, when ready.

data.name: SelectColorWindowDescriptionMessage
data.value: Klick with the left mouse button in the middle of the object that should be tracked.

data.name: ButtonOtherOptionsToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to display more options for the automatic detection.

data.name: ButtonExportDataToCsvLabelDescription
data.value: Exports the data into a text file with csv style

data.name: ButtonExportDataToCsvToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to export the current data into a textfile in csv style

data.name: ButtonExportDataToTxtLabelDescription
data.value: Exports the data into a text file

data.name: ButtonExportDataToTxtToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to export the current data into a textfile.

data.name: ButtonExportDataToXlsLabelDescription
data.value: Exports the data into an excel worksheet

data.name: ButtonExportDataToXlsToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to export the current data into an excel worksheet.

data.name: ButtonExportDataToXmlLabelDescription
data.value: Exports the data into a xml file

data.name: ButtonExportDataToXmlToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to export the current data into a xml file.

data.name: ExportWhereToSaveFile
data.value: Where do you want to save the file?

data.name: ButtonCaptureVideoToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to capture a video stream from a webcam or other video input device for analysis.

data.name: ButtonExportChartToClipboardLabelDescription
data.value: Copies the current chart to the clipboard.

data.name: ButtonExportChartToClipboardToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to copy the current chart to the clipboard.

data.name: ButtonExportChartToFileLabelDescription
data.value: Saves the current chart to disk.

data.name: ButtonExportChartToFileToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to save the current chart to disk.

data.name: ButtonExportChartToWordLabelDescription
data.value: Opens the current chart in word.

data.name: ButtonExportChartToWordToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to open the current chart in word.

data.name: GraphicFilesFilter
data.value: PNG - Portable Network Graphics|*.png|JPEG - Joint Photographics Experts Group|*.jpg|XAML - Extensible Application Markup Language|*.xaml|SVG - Scalable Vector Graphics|*.svg|BMP - Bitmap|*.bmp|TIF - Tagged Image File|*.tif|GIF - Graphics Interchange|*.gif|WMP - Windows Media Photo|*.wmp

data.name: GraphicFilesSaveFileDialogTitle
data.value: Please specify an image file name ...

data.name: ButtonChooseAnalysisLabelDescription
data.value: Select manual or automatic analysis mode.

data.name: ButtonChooseAnalysisToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to select manual or automatic analysis mode along with other options.

data.name: ChartDisplayOptionsLabelDescription
data.value: Displays properties pane for axes description and other options.

data.name: ChartDisplayOptionsToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to display properties pane for axes description and other options.

data.name: ButtonChooseAutomaticAnalysisToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here for automatic video analysis setup

data.name: ButtonAutomaticDataAquisitionStopLabelDescription
data.value: Stop the automatic detection of the target.

data.name: ButtonAutomaticDataAquisitionStopToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to stop the auto detection of the target object in each video frame.

data.name: ButtonCalculateVelocityToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to calculate distance, velocity, acceleration of the data samples.

data.name: ButtonDeleteDataToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to delete the captured data samples.

data.name: ButtonVideoCaptureDevicePropertiesLabelDescription
data.value: Show properties dialog for selected video device.

data.name: ButtonVideoCaptureDevicePropertiesToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to display a dialog for selecting and modifying options for the selected video device.

data.name: ButtonRecordVideoLabelDescription
data.value: Opens a video recording window, which enables to save life video from connected devices to disk for further analysis.

data.name: ButtonRecordVideoToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to open a video recording window, which enables to save life video from connected devices to disk for further analysis.

data.name: ButtonRecordVideoToolTipTitle
data.value: Record video from device to disk.

data.name: VideoSaveFolderBrowserDescriptionTitle
data.value: Please select a folder for the new video files ...

data.name: ButtonIsInterpolatingDataLabelDescription
data.value: Calculates interpolated values for the derived values

data.name: ButtonIsInterpolatingDataToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to smooth velocity and accelerationd data.

data.name: InterpolationDialogNumberOfSamplesToUse
data.value: Number of the samples to use for interpolation

data.name: InterpolationDialogTitle
data.value: Specify the parameters of the interpolation filter.

data.name: InterpolationMovingAverageDescription
data.value: This interpolation filter calculates a moving average of the given number of samples.

data.name: ButtonInterpolationPropertiesLabelDescription
data.value: Displays a dialog to specify interpolation properties.

data.name: ButtonInterpolationPropertiesToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to display a dialog for detailed specification of interpolation options.

data.name: ButtonSelectNumberOfObjectsLabelDescription
data.value: Specifies the number of tracker objects in the video.

data.name: ButtonSelectNumberOfObjectsToolTipDescription
data.value: This is the number of tracked objects.

data.name: ExponentialSmoothDialogSmoothingFactorLabel
data.value: Smoothing factor, determines the weighting of the interpolated data point.

data.name: InterpolationExponentialSmoothDescription
data.value: Exponential smoothing weights the current value with the smoothing factor and adds the interpolated foregoing data sample weighted with (1-smoothing factor).

data.name: ButtonSelectObjectLabelDescription
data.value: Changes the object the parameters are valid for.

data.name: ButtonSelectObjectToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here to change the object index. The parameters on the right are specified only for this object.

data.name: RegressionDialogTitle
data.value: Here you can choose the type of the Regressionting function

data.name: LineOptionsDialogTitle
data.value: Specify the number of digits when showing decimals.

data.name: RegressionCalculatorDialogTitle
data.value: Calculator or input for functionterms (theoretical Funktion)

data.name: ButtonExportChartToolTipDescription
data.value: Exports the displayed diagram into clipboard or different file formats.

data.name: ButtonExportDataToolTipDescription
data.value: Enables data export to different file formats like txt, csv, xml and xls

data.name: LineStyleOptionsDialogTitle
data.value: Please specify color and thickness of data curve

data.name: QATButtonOpenToolTipDescription
data.value: Opens a project file for further analysis.

data.name: AskSaveProjectDialogMessage
data.value: You worked with a newly created project. Should it be saved before closing?

data.name: QATButtonSaveAsToolTipDescription
data.value: Saves the current project under a new name.

data.name: SaveProjectDialogMessage
data.value: The project file already exists and will be overwritten.

data.name: AboutBoxCredits
data.value: Herwig Niemeyer for the regression and theory series functionality along with lots of bug fixes.

data.name: ButtonSwitchTimeUnitToolTipDescription
data.value: Change the unit for the time variable, e.g. from milliseconds to seconds.

data.name: TimeUnitDialogDescription
data.value: Choose the unit for the time variable which to be used for the display.

data.name: CalibrationLengthToShortMessage
data.value: The measured distance is to small to be valid, please try again.

data.name: ShowVideoInfosButtonToolTipDescription
data.value: Click here, to display time unit, codec information, length and other information about the loaded video file.

data.name: VideoInfoDialogTopFrameTitle
data.value: Check and modify the video file properties.

data.name: ExportDialogTopFrameTitle
data.value: Pleae specify the data columns to be exported.

data.name: ExportOptionsDialogObjectGroupHeader
data.value: Export data for the following objects:

data.name: ManualDataAcquisitionSkipPointCount
data.value: Number of images to skip (between data points)

data.name: ButtonSkipPointsToolTipDescription
data.value: Click, here to specify the number of points between two data samples that are ignored for analysis.

data.name: SkipPointsDialogDescription
data.value: Each n.th sample should be used for analysis.
